INSTRUCCIONES		BINARIO:					HEXADECIMAL:
-------------		--------				 	------------
mov 0, r0		00 0000000000 00000 000000 000000000		00000000
mov 30000, r1		00 0111010100 00001 110000 000000000		1D40E000
mov 30000, r2		00 0111010100 00010 110000 000000000		1D416000
mov 30000, r3		00 0111010100 00011 110000 000000000		1D41E000
mov 7000, r4		00 0001101101 00100 011000 000000000		06D23000
mov 100, r5		00 0000000001 00101 100100 000000000		0012C800
mov 10, r6		00 0000000000 00110 001010 000000000		00031400
mov 3, r7		00 0000000000 00111 000011 000000000		00038600

add r1, r2, r0		01 00001 00010 00000 000000000000000		42200000
add r0, r3, r0		01 00000 00011 00000 000000000000000		40300000
add r0, r4, r0		01 00000 00100 00000 000000000000000		40400000
add r0, r5, r0		01 00000 00101 00000 000000000000000		40500000
add r0, r6, r0		01 00000 00110 00000 000000000000000		40600000
add r0, r7, r0		01 00000 00111 00000 000000000000000		40700000

halt			11 000000000000000000000000000000		C0000000



mov -> 00 KKKKKKKKKK ttttt KKKKKK ---------
add -> 01 aaaaa bbbbb ttttt ---------------
halt-> 11 ------------------------------
